articles.headline: Property tax records disclose wealth of stories
articles.summary: Investigation into Delaware's farmland preservation program reveals misuse by wealthy landowners and companies to avoid property taxes.

articles.headline: More problems uncovered with FAA data
articles.summary: The Cleveland Plain Dealer exposes issues with FAA's Service Difficulty Reports, including missing and inconsistent data regarding airplane maintenance.

articles.headline: CAR routine in St. Louis
articles.summary: The St. Louis Post-Dispatch integrates computer-assisted reporting into everyday journalism practice, involving all reporters and editors in data usage.
